Title: Nature
Description: Artworks displying themes of intellectual thought spirituality and philosophy about humans and nature

Title: Historical Perspectives
Description: Artworks which sought to memorialize turning points in history.

Title: Landscapes
Description: Artwork which features different kinds of landscapes.

Title: Animals in Art
Description: Pieces which depict animals as the subject of the work.

Title: Everyday Moments
Description: Encourages viewers to appreciate little moments in life by highlight artwork that does the same.

Title: The Human as Art
Description: Explores the human as a form of art.

Title: The Cosmos
Description: Explores the relationship between humans and the cosmos.

Title: Abstract Art
Description: Focuses on artists that specialize in abstract art.

Title: Student Submissions
Description: Features artwork created by UTD students
